original_text: And Saul and the men of Israel were gathered, and encamped in the Valley of Elah, and drew up in line of battle against the Philistines.
korean_text: 사울과 이스라엘 사람들이 모여서 엘라 골짜기에 진 치고 블레셋 사람들을 대하여 전열을 벌였으니

sentences.original_text: And Saul and the men of Israel were gathered
and encamped in the Valley of Elah
and drew up in line of battle against the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람들을 대항하여 전열을 갖추었습니다.
